charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] met Shauna at the
town square.
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_0200_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I wanna ask
you a question!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_0300_1:
I wanna make memories with my Pokémon
on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_0400_1:
But... I just got here, so I’m not sure
where to go!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_0500_1:
Can you tell me any spots you’d recommend,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_0402_0900_1:
Wow! That sounds good! Chesnaught would like
that, too!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_1000_1: If it’s your recommendation, I’m sure it’ll be great!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_1100_1: I could meet new people there, too!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_1200_1:
Making one hundred friends won’t be just
a dream!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_1500_1:
Thank you for recommending that place,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_1600_1: I went there, and it was so much fun!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_1700_1:
I’m on my way back home and was sharing
sweets with Chesnaught!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_0401_1900_1: Right? Every day is so much fun with her!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_0402_2100_1: Thanks! I get really happy when we’re praised!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2200_1:
When I was deciding on my partner, I was
wondering which Pokémon I should choose...
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2300_1:
Since Chesnaught is energetic and full of curiosity,
I thought she would be interested in making
memories on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2500_1:
Oh, but as much as we like to have fun, we’re
also serious about Pokémon battles, too.
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2600_1:
I started my journey with Serena and Calem, and
although they’re many steps ahead of me...
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2700_1: that doesn’t mean I’m staying behind!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2800_1: We’ve both prepared a lot, haven’t we?
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_2900_1:
But Chesnaught pushes herself too hard and can
be a bit of a rascal...
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_3000_1: So I need to be firm and calm as her Trainer!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_0402_3400_1:
We can do anything we try as long as
we’re together!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_3600_1: I’m so happy that we became friends!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_3700_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Do you
wanna go with me to that place you
recommended earlier?
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_0401_3900_1: It’ll be a memory we’ll never forget!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_0402_4100_1:
Hehe, I remembered how fun it was, so I want to
go there again! ♪
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_4200_1: If it’s with you, I bet it’ll be even more fun!
charaepi_ch0139_00_sana/2301_1201_4300_1: It’s exciting to make fun memories on Pasio! ♪
